trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, represents a data store for writing and reading user annotations.
trans-unit.target: När åsidosätts i en härledd klass representerar ett datalager för att skriva och läsa användaranteckningar.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> to the store.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till en ny <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> till arkivet.

trans-unit.source: When a new <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> is added to the store its [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> property is set to a new value.
trans-unit.target: När en ny <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>har lagts till i arkivet för dess [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>-egenskapen anges till ett nytt värde.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>

trans-unit.source: When AddAnnotation is called, its <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> property is checked to see if the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> already has been added to the store.
trans-unit.target: När AddAnnotation anropas, dess <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>egenskapen kontrolleras för att se om den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>redan har lagts till i arkivet.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> already has been added and exists in the store (as determined by its <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> property) an <xref:System.ArgumentException> error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>redan har lagts till och finns i arkivet (enligt dess <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>egenskapen) ett <xref:System.ArgumentException>felmeddelande.</xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>

trans-unit.source: The annotation to add to the store.
trans-unit.target: Anteckningen genom att lägga till i arkivet.

trans-unit.source: newAnnotation is .
trans-unit.target: newAnnotationis .

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> with the same <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> property value already exists in the store.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> med samma <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>värdet för egenskapen finns redan i arkivet.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>har anropats på store.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an anchor on any <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> in the store changes.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när ett ankare på någon <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> i store ändras.

trans-unit.source: The AnchorChanged event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A> contained in the store without the need to register on each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individually.
trans-unit.target: Händelsen AnchorChanged kan användas för att övervaka ändringar av anteckningen <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A>finns i arkivet utan att behöva registrera på varje <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>individuellt.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an author on any <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> in the store changes.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en författare på någon <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> i store ändras.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged> event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A> contained in the store without the need to register on each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individually.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged>händelse kan användas för att övervaka ändringar av anteckningen <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A>finns i arkivet utan att behöva registrera på varje <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>individuellt.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om data i anteckningens buffertar ska skrivas direkt till den fysiska databasen.

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an explicit-save model can set AutoFlush to `false` and call <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> directly when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: Program som använder en explicit Spara modell kan ange AutoFlush till `false` och anropa <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>direkt vid behov.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an implicit-save model can set AutoFlush to `true` to cause <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> to be called automatically after every store operation (add, delete, or modify).
trans-unit.target: Program som använder en implicit Spara modell kan ange AutoFlush till `true` kan orsaka <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>anropas automatiskt efter varje Lagringsåtgärden (lägga till, ta bort eller ändra).</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store for each operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if data in the annotation buffers is to be written when the application explicitly calls <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om data i anteckningens buffertar ska skrivas direkt till den fysiska databasen för varje åtgärd. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> om data i anteckningens buffertar ska skrivas när programmet explicit anropar <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush*>.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cargo on any <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> in the store changes.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en last på någon <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> i store ändras.

trans-unit.source: The CargoChanged event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> contained in the store without the need to register on each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individually.
trans-unit.target: Händelsen CargoChanged kan användas för att övervaka ändringar av anteckningen <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A>finns i arkivet utan att behöva registrera på varje <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>individuellt.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the annotation with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> from the store.
trans-unit.target: Tar bort anteckning med det angivna <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>från store.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> property of the annotation to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>-egenskapen för anteckningens som ska tas bort.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The annotation that was deleted; otherwise, if an annotation with the specified annotationId was not found in the store.
trans-unit.target: Anteckningen har tagits bort; Annars om en anteckning med det angivna annotationId hittades inte i arkivet.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>har anropats på store.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources used by the store.
trans-unit.target: Frigör alla hanterade och ohanterade resurser som används i butiken.

trans-unit.source: Applications should call Dispose when finished with the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>.
trans-unit.target: Program ska anropa Dispose när du är klar med <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose the application can release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> to allow the garbage collector to reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: När du anropar Dispose programmet kan släppa alla referenser till den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>att frigöra minne garbage collector som den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>var använder.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [Rensa ohanterade resurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) och [implementera en metod för ta bort](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The public Dispose method calls the protected <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>`(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter of `true` to release all managed and unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Metoden offentliga Dispose anropar skyddade <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> `(Boolean)` metod med den `disposing` -parametern för `true` att släppa alla hanterade och ohanterade resurser.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Call Dispose before the last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> is released.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Anropa avyttra före sista referensen till den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>släpps.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: If Dispose is not called, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> resources will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the store's <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Om Dispose inte anropas, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>kommer inte att frigöra resurser förrän skräpinsamlingen anropar butikens <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A>metod.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the store and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Släpper ohanterade resurserna som används av arkivet och släpper eventuellt hanterade resurser.

trans-unit.source: This protected Dispose method is called by the public <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>and <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Den här skyddade Dispose metoden anropas av allmänheten <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>och <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: The public <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected Dispose`(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Offentligt <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>anropar skyddade Dispose`(Boolean)` metod med den `disposing` parametern `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes Dispose with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>anropar Dispose med `disposing` inställd på `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, Dispose releases all resources held by any managed objects that the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> references.
trans-unit.target: När den `disposing` parametern är `true`, Dispose versioner alla resurser från alla hanterade objekt som den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>referenser.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: Dispose also invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Dispose anropar också den `Dispose()` metod för varje refererade till objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Frisläpp både hanterade och ohanterade resurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> att släppa endast resurser som inte hanteras.

trans-unit.source: Guarantees that <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> will eventually be called for this store.
trans-unit.target: Garanterar att <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>slutligen anropas för det här arkivet.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides base <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden åsidosätter base <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metod.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application program should not call Finalize directly.
trans-unit.target: Slutför bör inte anropa direkt i programmet.

trans-unit.source: Finalize is automatically invoked during garbage collection unless disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Slutför automatiskt anropas under skräpinsamling inaktiverat av ett anrop till den <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>metoden.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [Finalize-metoderna och destruktorer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [rengöras ohanterade resurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), och [åsidosätter metoden Slutför](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Forces any annotation data retained in internal buffers to be written to the underlying storage device.
trans-unit.target: Tvingar anteckningens data kvar i interna buffertar som ska skrivas till den underliggande lagringsenheten.

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an explicit-save model can set <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> to `false` and call Flush directly when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: Program som använder en explicit Spara modell kan ange <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>till `false` och anropa Flush direkt när det är lämpligt.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an implicit-save model can set the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> to `true` to cause Flush to be called automatically after every store operation (add, delete, or modify).
trans-unit.target: Program som använder en implicit Spara modell kan ange den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>till `true` kan orsaka Flush anropas automatiskt efter varje Lagringsåtgärden (lägga till, ta bort eller ändra).</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>har anropats på store.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the annotation with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> from the store.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar anteckning med det angivna <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>från store.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> property of the annotation to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>-egenskapen för anteckningen ska returneras.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The annotation with the given annotationId; or , if an annotation with the specified annotationId was not found in the store.
trans-unit.target: Anteckning med den angivna annotationId ; eller , om en anteckning med det angivna annotationId hittades inte i arkivet.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>har anropats på store.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all the annotations in the store.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en lista över alla anteckningar i arkivet.

trans-unit.source: The list of all annotations currently contained in the store.
trans-unit.target: Lista över alla anteckningar som för närvarande finns i arkivet.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>har anropats på store.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of annotations that have <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*> with locators that begin with a matching <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"></xref> sequence.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en lista med anteckningar som har <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*>med lokaliserare som börjar med en matchande <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"> </xref> sekvens.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*>

trans-unit.source: This GetAnnotations method internally uses the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> class to search and match for the annotations to return.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden GetAnnotations använder internt den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A>metod för den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>klassen för att söka och matcha för anteckningar att returnera.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A>

trans-unit.source: The starting <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"></xref> sequence to return matching annotations for.
trans-unit.target: Med början <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"> </xref> sekvens att returnera matchande anteckningar för.

trans-unit.source: The list of annotations that have with locators that start and match the given anchorLocator; otherwise, if no matching annotations were found.
trans-unit.target: Listan över anteckningar som har med lokaliserare som startar och matcha den angivna anchorLocator , annars om ingen matchande anteckningar hittades.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>har anropats.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>har anropats, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genererar den <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AuthorChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genererar den <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AuthorChanged"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.CargoChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genererar den <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.CargoChanged"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.StoreContentChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genererar den <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.StoreContentChanged"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> is added to or deleted from the store.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> läggs till eller tas bort från store.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object to use as a synchronization lock for <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> critical sections.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar objektet som ska användas som ett lås för synkronisering för <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref> viktiga avsnitt.

trans-unit.source: The object to use as a synchronization lock for <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> critical sections.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som ska användas som ett lås för synkronisering för <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref> viktiga avsnitt.
